name: Our Moon- Mens Tshirt- Charcoal color- Geeky/ Hipster Style/ Sizes- S/ M/ L/ XL / Gift for him
description:
♦♦♦ Our Moon- casual wear T-shirt- during you are on vacation,dayout,college,gathering, weekend.
-2 color print of White/ Light Grey -soft ink waterbased.All hand screen printed process on Gildan ® Softstyle Adult Men,100% cotton t-shirts in Charcoal color. ♦♦♦ 


These shirts are hand printed at clean & smoke free studio.Choose your comfort sizes,all ours shirts are comfy, cozy, breathable shirt !

All Graphy Tee shirts have custom tags printed as photo shown.
(brand name/size/care instructions)

◊◊◊ Care instructions & T-shirt details ◊◊◊ 

♦♦♦ Most of our shirts made by 100% cotton,preshrunk jersey knit ♦♦♦ 
Machine wash in cold, inside out, Tumble dry low.No iron direct on images.No bleach.No dry clean.


Available Sizes : S, M, L or XL

Measurements guide as follows: 

Size= Chest/Width (inches) x Length (inches)

Small - 18.5" by 26"
Medium -19.7" by 27.2"
Large - 20.9" by 28.3"
XL - 22" by 29.1"
2XL - 23.2" by 29.9"


HOW TO READ OUR SIZING MEASUREMENTS

*Chest is measured 1" down from the armhole (1/2 measurement). 
*Length is measured in a straight line at point where neck trim meets body to bottom of garment 
(including any bottom trim). 

Example: Large is 20.9" by 28.3"
(Chest 1st, then Length)



♦♦♦ Current Promotion ♦♦♦ 

◊◊◊ EXPRESS SHIPPING SERVICE ◊◊◊ 

To your door step within 3-5 business days !!! 


◊◊◊ Shipping Term & Condition ◊◊◊ 

We ship your destination Internationally !!!

⇒ Except P.O. BOX address, because all express mail and packages need to be signed for upon delivery.

⇒ P.O.BOX or APO address,following's country like: ISRAEL, BRAZIL, RUSSIA & REMOTE AREA address will ship with regular mail (shipping time 10-21 days)


⇒ All shipping address MUST not under remote area, please convo me to check if you are under remote area.( P.O.BOX )

◊◊◊ EUROPEAN ONION COUNTRIES ◊◊◊ Shipping Term & Condition ◊◊◊

⇒ NORMAL REGISTERED Shipping if your order 1 or 2 items only (shipping period 10-21 days)

⇒ If your order 3 T-SHIRTS above ,you are enjoy EXPRESS SHIPPING SERVICE (shipping period 3-5 business days)

◊◊◊ T&C Summary ◊◊◊

⇒ 1 & 2 Tshirts = Shipping fee from $6.95 ( Normal Registered mail 10-21 days ) for EUROPEAN ONION COUNTRIES only

⇒ 3 Tshirts = Shipping fee $6.95 + $3 + $3= $12.95 (Express Shipping Service 3-5 business days) SAME AS - Buy 3 Tees FREE upgrade to EXPRESS SHIPPING SERVICE (shipping period 3-5 business days)
